# Welcome! \n\n
To play SEGA Saturn games, follow this instructions.\n\n
1. Generate a image file from your game CD-ROM using DiscImageChef or something. Useful tools are listed [here](http://wiki.redump.org/index.php?title=Useful_Links).\n 2. Copy the image files to the directory **\"%1$s\"** in the smart phone internal storage.\n 3. Show drawer menu and tap \"Refresh Game List\". Then game list is shown.\n 4. Tap the game title you want to play.\n 5. Enjoy!\n \n For more detail checkout our [website](https://www.uoyabause.org/static_pages/guide).\n
DELETE CONFIRM NOT AVAILABLE! This function is only available for pro version Got it! Enter this PIN to your device Sign in to other devices Hide Status bar and Navigation bar
